bio: Words woven to inspire growth,and nurture relationships, celebrate the essence of life. Exploring personal growth, family, and the beauty of human connections
contributionDescription: My contribution to Optimism is by sharing my experience  to my community and other social media by asking them to try out inside the ecosystem and let them experience between L1 and L2. by sharing my experience to others i think it help to get more people to used Optimism
impactDescription: I think my contribution to Optimism will help the community to grow and to get more users to get to try out the ecosystem. by doing this i think it will helped to attract more governance participants into collective so that we can build a economy that works for everyone.
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, User Experience & Adoption, Governance & Tokens
